To all SUDOKU lovers: Here is a great chance to show your Sudoku solving ability. Sudoku is considered to be one of the best logical puzzles played world-wide. A good “SUDUKO” puzzle has only one solution and a single error in SUDOKU throws the whole game out. Gear up to face those 9 numbers which are all ﬁghting for the right spot on the 9x9 grid as time ticks away! This gets even harder with the increased difficulty in the level of Sudoku as you proceed to the next rounds. So get ready to have a great time solving some interesting, mind-boggling, invigorating puzzles! 
EVENT STRUCTURE: 
ROUND 1: It will consist of the team solving the most classic 9x9 grid SUDOKU. The selection criteria will be the accuracy and the speed in solving the puzzle. 
ROUND 2: This round will too have the same selection criteria with increasing difficulty in the level of the puzzle. 
ROUND 3: The last and the ﬁnal round will be the toughest of all as it will determine the winner of the event.


RULES: 
1. Overwritng is not allowed. 
2. The teams are not allowed to bring rough papers. 
3. All necessary materials will be provided at the me of the event. 
4. Decisions taken by event heads and coordinators will be considered ﬁnal and binding to all. 
5. Rules and structure of event may be changed without prior intimation.


SCORING: 
1. Teams will be shortlisted on the basis of time and accuracy. The ones to submit ﬁrst will be given priority on the other teams. 
2. If two teams submit their answers simultaneously, then the one with correct answer will be considered. If both have correct answers, then both the teams will be shortlisted. 
3. Appropriate time will be given for each round depending upon the level of the Sudoku puzzle in the respective round.


TEAM SIZE: INDIVIDUAL PARTICIPANT
